com.powerdata.openpa

Class PflowModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.powerdata.openpa.impl.ModelBuilderI
      • com.powerdata.openpa.PflowModelBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PFlowPsmModelBldr

    public abstract class PflowModelBuilder
extends com.powerdata.openpa.impl.ModelBuilderI
    Build Models with load options suitable by some power apps (i.e. a power flow)
